version_description:
- Added support for dark mode
- Added support for live photos
- Updated video marks on grid screens. They now contain video duration
- Added option to app settings to show live photo marks on grid screens
- Bug fixes and minor improvements

- Fixed major bugs and crashes
- Minor UI improvements
Minor bug fixes and stability improvements

- Fixed rounding of video duration on grid screens
- Minor UI improvemets
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

- Fixed frameless layout for newer devices
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
